sections.heading: Frank J. Kelley Walkway; Designation.Section 19.112 - Signage; Recognition.
sections.text:
In recognition of the outstanding service provided to this state by former State Attorney General Frank J. Kelley during the course of his service from December 28, 1961 to December 31, 1998, the pedestrian walkway running east to west connecting the Michigan State Capitol Building with the Michigan Hall of Justice, in Lansing, Michigan, is designated as the Frank J. Kelley Walkway.

History:2012, Act 486, Eff. Mar. 28, 2013

sections.heading: Signage; Recognition.
sections.text:
The department of technology, management, and budget shall provide appropriate signage and recognition to reflect the designation under section 1.

History:2012, Act 486, Eff. Mar. 28, 2013
